title: The Many Lives of Nathan James
description: Desperate to reignite his creative passion, Nathan James and his girlfriend Liv make an appointment with the renowned Dr. Rose to regress into their past lives, in hopes of sparking inspiration. Through a skeptical eye, Nathan embarks on an unexpected journey through the fatal mistakes of his past, discovering that this pattern has followed him into the present. Now, in modern day New York City, those mistakes threaten to ruin his life, again. Armed with the wisdom of his past selves, Nathan sets out to stop this vicious cycle from destroying his future and his relationships.Huberâ€™s debut novel blurs the line between life and death in an imaginative and emotionally charged story about the unbreakable bond of soulmates. The Many Lives of Nathan James Series continues with the second installment, The Many Lives of Nathan Chasing Ghosts, due out next year.
author: H.C. Huber
